<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">2a677eb62fed301070fdfcecf699b6da</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1d78fe262f25301070fdfcecf699b66d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill Vehicle Details</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	g_form.getReference('vehicle_choice', displayInfo);
	
	function displayInfo(vehicle){
	g_form.setValue('make', vehicle.u_brand);
	g_form.setValue('model', vehicle.u_model);
	g_form.setValue('year', vehicle.u_year);
	g_form.setValue('price_per_day', vehicle.u_price_per_day);
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 15:30:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7e6736f62fed301070fdfcecf699b6be</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill Vehicle Details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7e6736f62fed301070fdfcecf699b6be</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 15:30:46</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_f6c68bf22f21701070fdfcecf699b6b3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">242272622f25301070fdfcecf699b667</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:dc5c3ae62f25301070fdfcecf699b64d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Rental total</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

 var startDate = g_form.getValue('rental_start_date');
	var endDate = g_form.getValue('rental_end_date');
	var dayPrice = g_form.getValue('price_per_day');
	
	

  var ga=new GlideAjax('global.GetTotal');
	

	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','total');
	

  ga.addParam('sysparm_start',startDate);

  ga.addParam('sysparm_end',endDate);

	ga.addParam('sysparm_price', dayPrice);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(finalVal);
	
   function finalVal(response){
	   var rentalTotal = JSON.parse(response);
	   g_form.setValue('rental_cost', rentalTotal.value);
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 16:43:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f6c68bf22f21701070fdfcecf699b6b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Rental total</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f6c68bf22f21701070fdfcecf699b6b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 19:13:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">242272622f25301070fdfcecf699b667</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:dc5c3ae62f25301070fdfcecf699b64d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Rental Total</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var total;
	var ga = new GlideAjax('RentTotal');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','rentalTotal');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_start',g_form.getValue('rental_start_date'));

	ga.addParam('sysparm_end',g_form.getValue('rental_end_date'));

	ga.addParam('sysparm_price',g_form.getValue('price_per_day'));
	
	ga.getXMLWait();

	total = ga.getAnswer();
	
	g_form.setValue('rental_cost',total);

   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 20:16:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>74f4b7362fa1701070fdfcecf699b610</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Rental Total</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_74f4b7362fa1701070fdfcecf699b610</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 20:39:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e7ca0bb62f21701070fdfcecf699b6db
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetTotal</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetTotal</name><script><![CDATA[var GetTotal = Class.create();
GetTotal.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
total:function(){
obj = {};
var start=this.getParameter('start');

  var end=this.getParameter('end');

  var diff = dateDiff(start,end);
	var price = this.getParameter('price');
	
	obj.value = price * diff;
	return JSON.stringify(obj);

},
    type: 'GetTotal'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 16:57:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>e7ca0bb62f21701070fdfcecf699b6db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetTotal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e7ca0bb62f21701070fdfcecf699b6db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 19:00:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">242272622f25301070fdfcecf699b667</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1d78fe262f25301070fdfcecf699b66d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill Vehicle Details</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	g_form.getReference('vehicle_choice', displayInfo);
	
	function displayInfo(vehicle){
	g_form.setValue('make', vehicle.u_brand);
	g_form.setValue('model', vehicle.u_model);
	g_form.setValue('year', vehicle.u_year);
	g_form.setValue('price_per_day', vehicle.u_price_per_day);
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 03:05:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bf0cc0fe2fe5301070fdfcecf699b612</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill Vehicle Details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bf0cc0fe2fe5301070fdfcecf699b612</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 20:38:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">242272622f25301070fdfcecf699b667</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:dc5c3ae62f25301070fdfcecf699b64d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Rental total</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var endDate = new GlideDate(rental_end_date.getValue());
	alert(endDate);
	var startDate = new GlideDate(rental_start_date.getValue());
 
	var days = GlideDate.subtract(endDate,startDate);
	
	g_form.setValue('rental_cost',  price_per_day.getValue() * days);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 16:16:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3e2f3e7e2fed301070fdfcecf699b630</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Rental total</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3e2f3e7e2fed301070fdfcecf699b630</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 16:24:33</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetTotal</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetTotal</name><script><![CDATA[var GetTotal = Class.create();
GetTotal.Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

total:function(){

var start=this.getParameter('sysparm_start');

  var end=this.getParameter('sysparm_end');

  var diff =  gs.dateDiff(start,end);
	var price = this.getparameter('sysparm_price');
	
	return price * diff;

},

    type: 'GetTotal'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 16:49:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>1088cb722f21701070fdfcecf699b6b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetTotal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1088cb722f21701070fdfcecf699b6b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 16:49:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">1f091f322f61701070fdfcecf699b636</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1d78fe262f25301070fdfcecf699b66d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get Rental total</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

  var rentalTotal;

  var ga=new GlideAjax('global.GetTotal');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_total','total');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_price', g_form.getValue('price_per_day'));

  ga.addParam('sysparm_start',g_form.getValue('rental_start_date'));

  ga.addParam('sysparm_end',g_form.getValue('rental_end_date'));

rentalTotal = ga.getXMLAnswer();

  g_form.setValue('rental_cost',rentalTotal);
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 17:57:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b3091f322f61701070fdfcecf699b6b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Rental total</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b3091f322f61701070fdfcecf699b6b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 17:57:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">242272622f25301070fdfcecf699b667</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a7e376a22f25301070fdfcecf699b695</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>User is Premium Member</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

  g_form.getReference('name', isPremium);
	
	function isPremium(user){
		
		var premium = user.u_type_of_membership.search("Premium");
		if(premium == 0){
			g_form.setValue('premium_member', yes);
		}
		else{
			g_form.setValue('premium_member', no);
		}
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 04:04:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>948658f62f29301070fdfcecf699b6bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>User is Premium Member</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_948658f62f29301070fdfcecf699b6bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 04:28:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Rental Request Form">e373d8362f29301070fdfcecf699b6ab</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1d78fe262f25301070fdfcecf699b66d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill Vehicle Details</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	g_form.getReference('vehicle_choice', displayInfo);
	
	function displayInfo(vehicle){
	g_form.setValue('make', vehicle.u_brand);
	g_form.setValue('model', vehicle.u_model);
	g_form.setValue('year', vehicle.u_year);
	g_form.setValue('price_per_day', vehicle.u_price_per_day);
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 03:34:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>3d56c0a82f11701070fdfcecf699b65a</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3f731c362f29301070fdfcecf699b6cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill Vehicle Details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3f731c362f29301070fdfcecf699b6cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 03:34:35</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0a0973f62fa1701070fdfcecf699b6f0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RentTotal</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RentTotal</name><script><![CDATA[var RentTotal = Class.create();
RentTotal.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
rentalTotal:function(){
var total;
	
var start=this.getParameter('sysparm_start');

  var end=this.getParameter('sysparm_end');

	var price = this.getParameter('sysparm_price');
	
  var days =  gs.dateDiff(start,end);
	days = days.substr(0,1);
	
	total = days * price;
	
	return total;
	

},
    type: 'RentTotal'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bwoods97</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-28 20:20:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>0a0973f62fa1701070fdfcecf699b6f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RentTotal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0a0973f62fa1701070fdfcecf699b6f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bwoods97</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 20:29:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
